LanguageData.ROM_OccupationClothing.label: occupational clothing
LanguageData.ROM_OccupationClothing.description: Sew further complicated garments for common occupations such as detectives, police, nurses, and fishermen. [From Call of Cthulhu - Neutral Factions Mod]
LanguageData.ROM_MERFOutfits.label: riot combat gear
LanguageData.ROM_MERFOutfits.description: Allows the creation of advance threat disabling combat gear. [From Call of Cthulhu - Neutral Factions Mod]
